articles.title: FedEx’s Fred Smith, Blackstone’s LePatner, and 4 Other Notables We Lost This Year
articles.mainIdea: FedEx’s Fred Smith, Blackstone’s LePatner, and 4 Other Notables We Lost This Year
articles.summary: Barrons.com: FedEx’s Fred Smith, Blackstone’s LePatner, and 4 Other Notables We Lost This Year. Smith, founder and longstanding CEO of FedEx was the son of a successful businessman. Smith, who twice declined Bush’s offer to make him Defense Secretary, played himself in Tom Hanks’ movie Cast Away. Related tickers mentioned: BX, FDX, HAS, OXY.

articles.summary: Barrons.com: How AI Could Cause Social Security to Run Out of Money Sooner Than Expected. Productivity gains may be offset by job losses as AI disrupts the workforce, impacting the health of Social Security. Related tickers mentioned: NVDA.

articles.title: Entegris (ENTG) Management Confident in Future Growth Despite Bearish Sentiment from Goldman Sachs
articles.mainIdea: Entegris (ENTG) Management Confident in Future Growth Despite Bearish Sentiment from Goldman Sachs
articles.summary: Insider Monkey: Entegris (ENTG) Management Confident in Future Growth Despite Bearish Sentiment from Goldman Sachs. Entegris, Inc. (NASDAQ:ENTG) is included in our list of the best rising tech stocks to buy now. On December 15, TheFly reported that Goldman Sachs downgraded Entegris, Inc. (NASDAQ:ENTG) from “Neutral” to “Sell,” reducing the price target from $88 to $75. The firm revisited the stock while revising its 2026 outlook for semiconductor stocks.
